title: IMI_R
instructions: Reflect on your previous interactions with this streamer and rate your agreement with the following statements. If you have never watched this streamer before today, please select the left-most radio button.

labels: I've never watched this streamer before

q_text.text: I don't feel like I could really trust the streamer.
I'd like a chance to interact with the streamer more often.
I felt like I could really trust the streamer.
I feel close to the streamer.
It is likely that the streamer and I could become friends if we interacted a lot.
I'd really prefer not to interact with the streamer in the future.
I felt really distant with the streamer.
I really doubt that the streamer and I would ever be friends.
